name: HostelBite - Hostel Meal & Admin Dashboard Web App
features: Admin can add food and approve requests
description: HostelBite is a hostel management web app where users can request meals, interact through comments, and admins can manage menus, users, and permissions.
challenges: Implementing request approval flow and role-based dashboard.
improvements: Add notification system and real-time order tracking.

name: ProdQuery - Ethical Product Awareness & Boycott Platform
description: ProdQuery is a boycott-focused awareness platform where users can view, submit, and vote on product-related queries. It promotes transparency and encourages ethical consumer choices.
challenges: Building a dynamic reason-query system and token protection.
improvements: Add public voting, comment section, and admin analytics.

name: Green Circle - Sustainable E-commerce Platform for Eco Products
description: Green Circle is an eco-friendly e-commerce platform that promotes sustainable products. It supports categories, filters, and smooth user experiences.
challenges: Product category management and search filter.
improvements: Add payment integration and product review system.
